experience.company: SimPPL-registered under Mozilla Firefox, New York
experience.description:
Developed an AI-powered chatbot for physiotherapy students and doctors to practice diagnostic skills, using a JSON-based backend for storing and retrieving patient case studies.
Designed an interactive conversation system, allowing users to question a virtual patient, analyze symptoms, and make diagnostic decisions.
Implemented a feature to automatically generate and export case studies as PDFs, providing users with detailed reference materials.

Gathered requirements from clients and assisted in designing and developing static and dynamic websites using HTML, TailwindCSS and JavaScript.
Maintained and managed client websites, ensuring smooth functionality and updates.
Integrated Firebase to store and retrieve student details efficiently.
Implemented EmailJS for automated email notifications and communication.

projects.name: PhysioPlay
projects.description: Developed PhysioPlay, an AI-powered chatbot for physiotherapy students and doctors to practice diagnostics. It features an interactive system for analyzing patient symptoms and a JSON-based backend for storing case studies. Users can also generate and export case studies as PDFs for reference.

projects.name: Fake News Detection System
projects.description: Developed a Fake News Detection model using Logistic Regression and TF-IDF to classify news articles. The project included data preprocessing, stemming, and stopword removal, achieving high accuracy with Python and scikit-learn.

projects.name: Email Spam Classifier
projects.description: Developed a Spam Email Classifier using Logistic Regression and TF-IDF to categorize emails as spam or ham. The model was trained on email content, achieving high accuracy in predictions, and can classify new emails accordingly.

experience.summary:

Collaborating closely with a team of industry veterans, I play a pivotal role in dynamic, research-oriented endeavors. Within this dynamic ecosystem, I continuously refine my expertise, harnessing the latest breakthroughs in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

I developed strong coordination and communication skills, and took on new challenges with enthusiasm, always aiming to deliver high-quality results.

experience.summary:
As a proactive member of the Marketing at DJS-NSDC, I've been actively involved in searheading various initiatives to promote the organization's vision and mission. Leveraging my strong communication skills, I've collaborated with fellow team members to develop and execute innovative marketing strategies. From devising comprehensive social media campaigns to implementing effective digital marketing techniques, I've played a pivotal role in enhancing the organization's online presence. Additionally, my proficiency in email marketing has facilitated targeted outreach efforts, driving engagement and fostering meaningful connections. Through my contributions, I've been instrumental in amplifying the impact of DJS-NSDC's initiatives and reaching wider audiences.

🌟 Currently contributing as a Java Programming Intern at CodSoft, where I've been immersed in real-world projects and hands-on experiences. 🖥️ Leveraging my expertise in Java, JavaFX, and object-oriented programming (OOP), I've been actively involved in tackling challenging problems and implementing efficient solutions. 💡 With a strong foundation in data structures and a keen eye for problem-solving, I've collaborated with talented teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. 💻 Excited to continue learning and growing in this dynamic environment, I'm passionate about leveraging my skills to make a meaningful impact."
            

    
    

    
        Show less

In College, I am currently serving as a member of the Publicity Co-Committee at DJS S4DS (Dwarkadas Sanghvi School for Data Science). In this role, I am actively involved in promoting and enhancing the visibility of our organization's initiatives within the college community and beyond. From designing creative marketing materials to strategizing social media campaigns, I contribute to the effective communication and outreach efforts of the committee. Through my dedicated involvement, I aim to foster greater engagement and awareness of the impactful work being done by DJS S4DS.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

As an Indigo Squad Member at Mood Indigo, Asia's premier college cultural festival, I've been instrumental in shaping unforgettable experiences and fostering a vibrant community. From spearheading innovative marketing and publicity campaigns to collaborating seamlessly with team members, my role has allowed me to hone my skills in personal development and event management. By leveraging creativity and strategic thinking, I've contributed to the success of numerous events, driving increased participation and engagement. I'm proud to be part of an esteemed organization dedicated to excellence, and I'm excited to continue making a meaningful impact in the dynamic world of event management and community building

• Mahek's technical skills portfolio includes proficiency in programming languages such as C++, Java, Python, and JavaScript, as well as experience with frameworks like Flutter, and databases like MySQL, Oracle, and PostgreSQL.

• Mahek has demonstrated a strong understanding of the industry through his freelance project, Sparsh, an E-Commercial live website of CVD Diamond Jewellery, and his diploma final-year project, GupShup, which integrated Flutter application and Python machine learning model.

• Mahek's unique selling point is his ability to design and implement innovative solutions, as showcased in his projects, and his potential to leverage his skills and experience to drive business growth and success.

Early detection and diagnosis of mental health disorders based on patient-reported symptoms is vital in mental health care. This research proposes an ensemble learning pipeline for predicting mental health disorders using symptoms and demographic data. • Rachit Doshi has been a Cloud Computing Intern at WEBXELA, where he built a solid foundation in cloud service models, cloud deployment types, and IAM standards, from June to September 2024.

• With his innovative project FINDR (Food Industry Network for Digital Recommendations), Rachit generated accurate recommendations using TF-IDF vectorization and cosine similarity on collected data.

• Rachit boasts a strong technical skillset, proficient in programming languages such as Java, Python, and JavaScript, and having hands-on experience with frameworks like React.js, Node.js, and Flask.

• As a skilled cloud professional, Rachit has demonstrated expertise in Azure, AWS, and GCP cloud platforms, with experience in analyzing cloud pricing structures and services offered.

• Rachit's unique strength lies in his ability to leverage his technical expertise and industry knowledge to drive innovative solutions, making him a valuable asset to any organization.

• With a strong academic background in computer science, Arya R. Gawde excelled as an Artificial Intelligence and UI/UX Intern at 169Pi, developing a domain-specific Small Language Model and designing Education Mode wireframes.

• One of Arya's most notable projects is 'Enhancing Mental Health Disorder Detection Using Hybrid Ensemble Models', which achieved 94% accuracy across multiple disorders with SMOTE and optimized text feature extraction using TF-IDF.

• Arya's technical skills are impressive, with expertise in programming languages such as Python, C, and Java, as well as proficiency in frameworks and libraries like React.js and MediaPipe, and databases like MySQL.

• With research experience in spatial transcriptomics data analysis and graph-based modeling, Arya demonstrates a strong understanding of the life sciences and their application to real-world problems.

• Arya brings a unique combination of technical expertise, research experience, and leadership skills to the table, making them a valuable asset to any organization seeking to leverage AI and data science to drive innovation.

My journey into the world of technology began during my diploma in computer engineering, where I discovered my passion for programming. Since then, I have honed my web and app development skills.Throughout my academic career, I have actively sought out opportunities to apply my knowledge in real-world scenarios. I have completed internships and taken on freelance projects in web and app development, gaining hands-on experience in building responsive websites and user-friendly mobile applications.My goal is to continue growing as a software developer, leveraging my skills and experience to create innovative solutions. I am eager to connect with like-minded professionals, explore new opportunities, and contribute to impactful projects in the tech industry.Feel free to reach out to me if you'd like to discuss web or app development, or potential collaborations.

ai_summary_data.summary:
• As a Full Stack Developer Intern at FMX Proptech Pvt. Ltd., Sameer Gupta leveraged his technical expertise to develop the frontend and backend of a Visitor Management System, showcasing his proficiency in JavaScript, Node.js, and Express.

• Notably, Sameer Gupta designed and developed CosmosAI - AI Generated Game, a Procedural Content Generation and Dynamic Difficulty Adjustment system utilizing Deep Q-Learning and Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) to create engaging game levels.

• With a strong technical foundation in programming languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python, Sameer Gupta is well-versed in frameworks like ReactJS, Next.js, and Node.js, and databases such as MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.

• Sameer Gupta's industry knowledge and exposure to financial services and corporate strategies through the J.P. Morgan External Engagement Program have equipped him with a deep understanding of the sector and its nuances.

• As a versatile and innovative developer, Sameer Gupta's greatest strength lies in his ability to integrate cutting-edge technologies and deliver scalable solutions that seamlessly blend functionality and user experience.

profile_data.headline: Freelance Full Stack Developer | Data Analytics & AIML Enthusiast | Student at Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering
profile_data.about: Hi, I'm Satyavrat Tiwari, a passionate Artificial Intelligence & Data Science student and freelance full-stack developer committed to building meaningful, real-world solutions at the intersection of AI and web technologies.With a strong grasp of machine learning, natural language processing, and large language models (LLMs), I enjoy designing systems that are not only technically sound but also user-focused. My experience spans the development of intelligent chatbots, data-driven platforms, and end-to-end web applications—leveraging both backend logic and responsive UI frameworks.As a full-stack developer, I regularly work with technologies like Next.js, React.js, Node.js, Django, Flask, FastAPI,Python, Java, JavaScript and databases such as PostgreSQL and MongoDB.What sets me apart is the unique blend of technical expertise and a love for communication. I'm an active debater and public speaker, which helps me think critically, present ideas clearly, and collaborate effectively in diverse teams.I'm always looking to collaborate on meaningful projects and contribute to impactful tech communities. Let’s connect and create something great together.

projects.name: Predicting SpaceX Falcon 9 First Stage Landing Success
projects.description: Analyzed SpaceX Falcon 9 flight data to predict reusable first-stage landings, aiming to reduce space mission costs. Collected data through APIs and web scraping, followed by extensive cleaning and feature engineering. Performed exploratory data analysis with SQL and Python (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Folium, Plotly) to identify key trends and variable relationships. Trained and optimized machine learning models, enhancing predictive accuracy through iterative hyperparameter tuning.
projects.achievements: Final model successfully predicts optimal racing paths.

projects.name: Breast Cancer Data Analysis
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive analysis of medical reports from breast cancer patients using Pandas. Compared the findings for M atplotlib visualizations reports of healthy individuals to identify key differences. Identified and tried to deduce the causes of various types of breast cancer based on observed trends in the data.

projects.name: Racing Line Prediction for Formula 1 Onboard Footage
projects.description: Developed a semi-supervised U-Net and LSTM-based model to predict continuous racing lines from onboard F1 footage. Used U-Net to detect car nose position in each frame and LSTM to predict subsequent positions for smooth trajectory. Preprocessed over 26,000 frames for model training, achieving real-time frame-by-frame racing line predictions.
projects.achievements: Final model successfully predicts optimal racing paths.

key_achievements: Designed & implemented a high-throughput real-time messaging system using Apache Kafka & Solace, enabling 10M+ users to receive targeted broadcasts via dynamic topic filtering.
Achieved 70% reduction in database insertions through event streaming optimization, while implementing TTL (time-to-live) policies and persistent log compaction to ensure 24/7 message durability.

Orchestrated a CDC-powered data synchronization framework using Debezium + Kafka , enabling sub-second replication of records 1M+ from MySQL to ClickHouse. Achieved 99.9% data consistency while supporting real-time BI dashboards for loan risk analysis.

Revamped map visualization APIs to dynamically aggregate organizational member counts using geospatial sharding . Reduced query latency by 50% (from 2.1s to 1.05s) through R-tree indexing and bounding box optimizations in PostGIS.
Led end-to-end backend development of a BNPL (Buy Now Pay Later) platform. Architected AWS-based microservices handling $10k+ monthly transactions.

profile_data.about: I began my career working with Software Testing, my first job within the IT industry. This opportunity opened the door to my beginning at IBM where I worked with Oracle Database development and analysis, in this case specifically my first contact with coding and a feeling that varies between discoveries, learning, frustration, expectation and hours of hard work in solving errors. Despite the hard work invested in addressing these challenges, the satisfaction derived from resolving problems and meeting expectations cannot be overlooked. I believe every Developer identifies with these moments in their career, forming a deep passion for what we do.An informal conversation with a childhood friend, who happens to be an excellent Developer, sparked my interest in Web development. This led me to enroll in a bootcamp, an experience that felt like love at first sight! Over the years, my journey in Web development has continued, with a daily commitment to progress and staying updated on the latest technologies in the market.In summary, I am a Software Developer/Analyst with a successful 8+ years of experience.Please refer to my resume for details of my previous experience and skill set.Interested in checking the code I have worked? recommendations.name: Jakub Kozakiewicz
recommendations.summary:
“I had the pleasure of working with Fernando as a valued member of my development team. His dedication to delivering high-quality code and his ability to meet tight deadlines consistently impressed me.

Fernando is a self-motivated individual who seamlessly integrates into team dynamics. He's always eager to learn and adapt to new challenges, as evidenced by his significant contributions to our UI component library, particularly the dark mode implementation. His willingness to step outside his comfort zone and tackle complex projects showcases his potential for growth.

I highly recommend Fernando to any team seeking a talented and motivated developer.”

recommendations.name: Anushka Jayasekara
recommendations.summary:
“I had the privilege of working with Fernando on the same team, and I can confidently say that he is an exceptional Full Stack Developer and a true asset to any team. His ability to collaborate seamlessly with team members and communicate complex ideas in an accessible manner truly stands out.

Fernando's technical skills are outstanding, spanning both front-end and back-end development. He consistently delivers high-quality code that is efficient and reliable. Whether it's tackling challenging tasks or refining intricate details, his dedication to excellence is evident in every aspect of his work.

What sets Fernando apart is not only his technical expertise but also his efficiency and ability to meet tight deadlines without compromising the quality of the final product. He approaches each challenge with a solution-oriented and positive mindset, making him an indispensable team player.

I highly recommend having Fernando on any team. His skills, professionalism, and collaborative spirit will undoubtedly elevate any project he is part of.”

profile_data.headline: Winner at SIH'24 and SIH'23 | Winner at IDEA Hackathon by Union Bank | Maha Hackathon Challenge 1.0 Winner | 12x Hackathon Winner | Author of 6 Tech Books
profile_data.about: Hey there! I’m Sujal Choudhari—a third-year IT student at DJSCE, Mumbai, and a coding enthusiast who’s been tinkering with tech for over five years. I live at the intersection of creativity and code, building projects that solve problems, spark joy, and push boundaries. Here’s what I’ve been up to:🌟 I’ve created over 100 open-source projects on GitHub—my playground—featuring work like Neptune.js (a game engine born from a wild 80kb challenge) and Coda, where I’ve earned stars, forks, and a ton of fun collaborating with the dev community.📦 I’ve shipped packages on pub.dev, npmjs.com, and PyPI—little gifts to developers everywhere, making their lives easier one line of code at a time.📚 I’ve authored books on Amazon and Gumroad (some freebies too!), spilling my insights to inspire and empower the next wave of programmers.🏆 I’m a hackathon hustler—clinching Smart India Hackathon (twice!) and winning GenAI and AR/VR challenges, thriving on turning ideas into victories under pressure.I’m fluent in Python, C++, TypeScript, and more—think of me as a tech Swiss Army knife, equally at home crafting sleek web apps with React or immersive games in Unity. What drives me? A relentless curiosity, a knack for problem-solving, and a passion for creating stuff that matters.I’m always up for a challenge and eager to team up with folks who dream big. If you’re looking for a versatile developer who brings energy, skill, and a fresh perspective, let’s chat—I’d love to help turn your vision into reality! 🚀P.S. Check out my GitHub or sujal.xyz for a peek at what I’m building next! 👀

experience.summary:
Developed an interview automation platform leveraging AI-powered calls to assess candidates based on tone and speaking skills. This system reduced human intervention and interview time by 60% through scheduled calls managed via cron jobs, while strictly adhering to user requirements.Implemented a comprehensive analytics dashboard for visualizing interview metrics, skill gaps, and performance insights. Integrated LLMs for real-time transcript analysis, providing personalized recommendations for candidates and suggesting optimal workforce strategies (layoff, role change, or retraining).Designed a highly scalable system utilizing PostgreSQL and Serverless Functions. Managed complex data relationships across multiple entities and ensured system reliability through thorough functional testing.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

Architected a high-performance Python backend for FEDaiQuest, a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) solution. This system helps bankers quickly find accurate information with citations from official document sources, resulting in an 80% reduction in search times. Collaborated on the development of an automation system for the DelCapital X Genishi’s Cicon Project. This tool will enable regulated entities to comply with complex data reporting requirements mandated by credit bureaus.Enhanced Security Implementation: Implemented Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for enhanced security, along with robust encryption protocols for storing highly sensitive data.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

Served as a maintainer for Coda, an open-source programming language built on C++, during Hacktoberfest, guiding contributors and ensuring code quality.Reviewed and merged pull requests from community contributors, contributing to the refinement and enhancement of the Coda programming language and its ecosystem.Mentored new contributors to the Coda project, fostering a collaborative environment and promoting open-source development best practices during Hacktoberfest.Maintained and updated project documentation, including the comprehensive wiki, to ensure clarity and accessibility for new users and contributors to the Coda programming language.Managed the Coda GitHub repository, addressing issues, triaging bugs, and facilitating discussions within the community to advance the development of the language.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

Configured and maintained Google Sheets API integration for a website index checker application, managing authentication using service_account.json and ensuring proper access control.Managed application dependencies using requirements.txt and deployed the Flask-based application on Heroku with unicorn.Implemented URL indexing verification logic by sending targeted search queries to Google, utilizing specific User-Agent and language settings to accurately identify indexed URLs.Contributed to the development of a website index checker, enabling efficient verification of URL indexing status via Google Search and streamlining website SEO analysis.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

Proficient in Unity Engine, Godot, and native programming languages for game development.Successfully designed and developed a variety of games, including simulations, visual novels, strategy games, and endless runners.Notable projects include Dungeon Dwellers (multiplayer dungeon race), The October Nights (visual novel), and Core Defender (interactive adventure).Skilled in creating immersive gameplay experiences across diverse genres.Actively engaged with the gaming community to gather feedback and improve projects.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

profile_data.headline: CS at Caltech
profile_data.about: Current student at Caltech studying computer science. I am also currently interning at NVIDIA Research and an undergraduate researcher at Caltech's Anandkumar Lab, specializing in neural operator applications to solving PDEs. From 2019-2023, I conducted research at the University of Texas Institute for Geophysics, working in machine learning applications to geoscience since 2020.My current research interests lie broadly in deep learning, particularly in developing physically-guided and principled deep learning methods, such as for scientific applications.

ai_summary_data.summary:
• With extensive research experience at top institutions like NVIDIA Research and Caltech, Miguel Liu-Schiaffini has developed function space diffusion models for efficient image generation and designed neural operators for natural images.

• A notable project achievement is the development of learnable finite-difference kernels and local convolutions into existing neural operator frameworks, converting U-Net and other convolutional neural networks to neural operators.

• Miguel's technical skills include proficiency in Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, MATLAB, Java, C/C++, and R, with experience in frameworks like NumPy, SciPy, and Keras.

• He has demonstrated domain expertise in machine learning, computer vision, and geophysics, with research focused on neural operators, function spaces, and scientific simulations.

• As a highly accomplished researcher with a strong academic record, Miguel brings a unique combination of technical expertise, research experience, and passion for innovation, making him a valuable asset to any organization.

experience.position: WonderWorld: Interactive 3D Scene Generation from a Single Image
experience.description: Presented a novel framework for interactive 3D scene generation that enables users to interactively specify scene contents and layout and see the created scenes in low latency.
key_achievements: Introduced the Fast LAyered Gaussian Surfels (FLAGS) as the scene representation and an algorithm to generate it from a single view.
Employed the guided depth diffusion that allows partial conditioning of depth estimation.

experience.position: WonderJourney: Going from Anywhere to Everywhere
experience.description: Designed a modularized framework, which starts at any user-provided location and generate a journey through a long sequence of diverse yet coherently connected 3D scenes.
key_achievements: Leveraged an LLM to generate textual descriptions of the scenes in this journey, a text-driven point cloud generation pipeline to make a compelling and coherent sequence of 3D scenes, and a large VLM to verify the generated scenes.

experience.position: Adapting Large Pre-trained Models for Audio-Visual Downstream Tasks
experience.description: Proposed a novel Dual-Guided Spatial-Channel-Temporal attention mechanism, which leverages audio and visual modalities as soft prompts to dynamically adjust the parameters of pre-trained models based on the current multi-modal input features.
key_achievements: Achieved state-of-the-art results across multiple downstream tasks; exhibited promising performance in challenging few-shot and zero-shot scenarios.

Co-authored research paper published in Taylor & Francis Journal. Implemented Holt-Winters algorithm, ARIMA models. Replicated and extended augmented SEIR model, presented to NSF. Implemented ecological regression model.

• His most notable project, 'Fauxreal-AI', showcased his expertise in building a synthetic dataset generator using WGAN, CTGAN, and VAE, creating realistic datasets from user-provided samples.

• Dev Parekh's strongest technical capabilities include proficiency in programming languages such as Python, C/C++, and JavaScript, with experience in frameworks like Bootstrap and libraries like MySQL.

• With a background in artificial intelligence and machine learning, Dev Parekh has gained industry knowledge in these specialized areas, as evident from his projects and certifications.

• A results-driven student with a proven ability to tackle complex challenges, Dev Parekh brings a unique combination of technical expertise, leadership skills, and innovative thinking to any organization.
